sec.title: Print Subscription Discount for the Attendees of Partnering Conferences
sec.p: Bentham Science is pleased to offer 20% discount on listed rates for 2015 subscriptions to the attendees of partnering conferences http://benthamscience.com/journal/subscription-rates.php?yearID=2014 Please send your subscription orders at marketing@benthamscience.org or subscriptions@benthamscience.org
For further information on this offer, write to marketing@benthamscience.org
